data.title: Beyond Resilience : Donor Wall
data.meta_description: Beyond Resilience - The Campaign for Chestnut Hill College is honored and humbled by the generous gifts from the community. Meet the donors.
data.text:
Hearts on Fire Circle

Donors of $1,000,000 or more

As President, Sister Carol secured the College’s first million-dollar gift, forever changing the landscape of philanthropy at the institution.

Anonymous

Joseph P. Denny & April Denny

Deborah Dougherty Flint '59

Michael Gerard & Margaret Carney McCaffery '77

Legacy Circle

Donors of $500,000 - $999,999

One of the people most responsible for fueling the transformation at Chestnut Hill College has been Sister Carol, who challenged the College to evolve, while protecting its founding principles.

Harry J.J. Bellwoar, Esq.* & Joan McDermott Bellwoar '55*

J. Michael Fitzpatrick, Ph.D. and Jean Fitzpatrick, Ph.D.

The Gulati Family Foundation

Jack Gulati LLD & Rosemary Murphy Gulati, LLD '61

Visionary Circle

Donors of $250,000 to $499,999

Sister Carol created a student body that is reflective of the global community and a culture that boasts graduates who are catalysts for positive change in society.

Albert M. Greenfield Foundation

Francis* & Elaine Bennett Davey '65

Builders Circle

Donors of $100,000 to $249,999

Sister Carol has led us in building the College, both literally and figuratively, to what it is today, with new buildings and new programs, laying a solid foundation for our future.
